sub_title: Certified drone pilot A1/A2/A3 and system expert
summary:
Currently being Signify's global system expert for Interact Pro, our wireless lighting solution for SME's. If friends ask me what it is, I simplify the explanation by telling that it can be compared with Hue for professionals. I train our call centers world wide (Puerto Rico, Malaysia, The Netherlands, France, Denmark) and I am their contact for major escalations. I analyse customer feedback and make sure that this feedback is being used to prioritize R&D activities. I created and maintain a knowledge base and also advise on continuous improvements of activities and procedures in our systems business. It's great to construct and improve our quality while always keeping our customers at the first place.


Previous Highlights:
The Edge Amsterdam, installation of one of the most innovative lighting solutions. During the realisation I became one of the experts of Connected Office Lighting (based on Power over Ethernet). 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EW0LxjB4eGw

Rijksmuseum Amsterdam, realisation of the impressive Light Racks with their indirect and direct lighting hoovering above the art:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I9U4NX6tZ1A

Project manager @ Lighting renovation De Lage Landen: 
http://www.lighting.philips.nl/projects/de_lage_landen.wpd

http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=Ecd64qzw55o

Project management for the renovation of the lighting offices on the High Tech Campus

profile_positions.description:
The Global Segment team Office & Industry is responsible to define, validate and drive the introduction
of related architectures for the end user sales teams. As part of the global segment team, a System expert team is responsible to prepare and conduct technical training for the End User sales teams and the involved System Centers to enable the country organizations to successfully propose, sell and deliver these architectures in their Markets. The System Expert team also provides the technical training towards the Customer Satisfaction teams to enable them to successfully maintain these
customer sites.

My responsibilities are:
- Train and support globally the Customer Satisfaction Call centers, on O&I related connected systems sold through the whole-sale channel to enable them to successfully resolve installer and end-user escalations.
- Test Validate Document process - Assess, test and validate the system architecture from a user perspective.
- Setup and maintain a knowledge data base.
- Provide technical support to the call centers.
- Setup and execute a knowledge transfer from project team to call centers to ensure up to date support.
- Feedback market experience to the Segment team members and R&D community.
- Report conceptual issues via JIRA ticket system and Member of Change Committee Board.

My team
I am part of the Global System Expert team. My key customers are Call Centers in Europe, Asia, China,
Americas and the central Project team. I am based on the High Tech Campus in Eindhoven (Netherlands).
profile_positions.title: System Expert; Global – Office & Industry - Professional Lighting Systems

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the global deployment of CPQ (Configure, Price, Quote) within Philips Lighting Systems Centers
profile_positions.title: Global deployment lead CPQ

profile_positions.description:
I was working in our new European Lighting Solution Center focused on Systems and Services in Indoor Lighting Solutions (i.e.Smart Buildings).

I was one of the the catalysts of change and support sales growth in our strategic domains.As as Proposal Manager I manage the bid phase and develop quotations to
ensure we win Public Tenders in the field of Indoor Lighting Solutions. 

As Proposal Manager, I was responsible to submit highest quality customer proposal on-time and within budget. Furthermore I manage the full life cycle of unsolicited proposals, RFI and RFP responses including RFP analysis, preparing and administering work plans with team assignments, kick-off meetings, status calls, proposal development, proposal writing, production, submission, customer
presentation meetings, and debriefs

I also managed the development of compelling, accurate, professional, proposals in a time-critical environment.
I needed to ensure that all proposals are compliant with company policy, RFP requirements,
and applicable laws. Furthermore I:
- Represent Philips Lighting with customers and business partners
- Partner with internal stakeholders to blend our products, services, market intelligence, and company positioning into a narrative that conveys our value propositions 
- Develop presentations, processes and templates to support department and company growth
- Participates in the development of bid strategies and negotiates and assists in developing agreements with partners, subcontractors and team members
- Maintain proposal content library so that documentation and learning are captured
for future use
profile_positions.title: Proposal Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	Support sales
-	Update solution propositions using customers’ requests
-	Cooperate with system designers, 3rd partner producers, specialists and end-users. 
-	Building new propositions. Manage budget cost and prototyping cost
-	Search, select and train 3rd parties that can support Philips with their new propositions
-	Find the best solution/proposition for specific customer requests
-	Manage planned cost, quality and delivery times
-	Keeping updated about new technologies/market demands and informing R&D
-	Translate complex system requests into useful building blocks that can be used by Sales Engineers.
-	Managing projects and pilot-projects
-	Setup project teams
-	Handing over finished projects to after-sales
-	Training sales engineers, customers, sales, 3rd parties
profile_positions.title: Application Manager

profile_positions.description:
Philips is een veelzijdige onderneming die actief is op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en welzijn. De onderneming is gericht op verbetering van de kwaliteit van leven van mensen door middel van zinvolle innovaties op het terrein van gezondheidszorg, lifestyle en verlichting. Met het hoofdkantoor gevestigd in Nederland, heeft Philips – met in 2012 een omzet van EUR 24.8 miljard – wereldwijd circa 114.000 werknemers in dienst, met verkoop- en servicepunten verspreid over meer dan 100 landen. 

De onderneming heeft leiderschapsposities op het gebied van de cardiologie, spoedeisende zorg en zorg op afstand, energiezuinige verlichting en nieuwe verlichtingstoepassingen; daarnaast op het gebied van scheerapparaten en mondverzorgingsproducten.

Specialties
Gezondheidszorg, Medische apparatuur, Cardiologie, Spoedeisende zorg, Zorg op afstand, Verlichting, LED, Energiezuinige verlichting, B2B, Consumenten Electronics, Gebitsverzorging, Scheerapparaten
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
knowledge and personal interest in WAN/LAN/WLAN analysers, fiber optic installations, WDM, storage networks (SAN), VPN servers, router configration etc. This all has helped me to promote, sell and install various kinds of installations / systems durnig those 4 years working for this company.
Accounts among others: Eductional, ministery of defense, installers, advisors .
